name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, a student protest occurred at the North Campus of Linyi No. 1 Middle School in Shandong Province. The cause of the protest was that the school's "three days off and one day off" system during the Mid-Autumn Festival aroused dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/SsYgmG0Ewv

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, Chen Si, a Shanghai food delivery man who claimed to have earned 1.02 million yuan in three years, was reported to have been involved in a car accident. On the same day, a friend of Chen Si told reporters that Chen Si was indeed involved in a car accident while delivering food in Jiading District on the evening of the 17th, "with a fracture, and (the injury) is not light", and is currently receiving treatment in the hospital, accompanied by a friend.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, netizens submitted a post with the requirements for the Youth League Day activities at Fujian University of Water Resources and Hydropower.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, China Traffic Radio reported that in order to ensure the implementation of the Ye-Lu Expressway, a key project in Henan Province, the leaders of the Ye County People's Government led a team to forcibly demolish a college student entrepreneurial orchard, cut off the orchard's power supply, blocked the surrounding roads, snatched the mobile phones of people who came to take photos and collect evidence, pressed the people in the mud, and detained them in the police station for a whole day. Ye County Deputy Mayor Hu Weize said that for the progress of the project, he was willing to take responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the famous voice actor Shi Banyu passed away. On this day last year, he released a video complaining about the forced demolition of his studio in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the entry "Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School Principal Uses Student Holidays" has become a hot search on Tieba. The reason for the incident is that Xia Zhiqing, the principal of Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School in Guangdong, decided to use part of the Mid-Autumn Festival holiday to make up lessons, setting a precedent for making up lessons for the first and second graders of Jiangmen No. 1 Middle School during the Mid-Autumn Festival, which caused dissatisfaction among students. A 15-minute shouting activity broke out in the dormitory. Principal Xia Zhiqing has long been unpopular among students, and some students even established an "Anti-Qing (Xia Zhiqing) Alliance" to oppose his high-pressure management.

name: 李老师不是你老师

G13 bus in Changchun City, Jilin Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Japanese Embassy in China, a child from a Japanese school in Shenzhen was attacked and injured on the way to school. He died in the early morning of the 19th after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Japanese Embassy in China posted a warning about the attack on its Japanese website, urging the public to be vigilant. The Chinese website did not have this information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said: China will continue to take effective measures to ensure the safety of all foreigners in China. Chinese netizens responded, "Thank you for your hard work, brother" and "Thank you for your hard work, brother! Three cups to you!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, a group of Chinese living in Japan issued a joint statement condemning the September 18 attack on Japanese schoolchildren in Shenzhen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, topics related to the attack on Japanese elementary school students in Shenzhen have been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, some Shenzhen citizens went to the gate of the Japanese school to lay flowers to mourn the children who died in the attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19, Suqian, Jiangsu. A car hit pedestrians on the east side of Sizhou School, and some students and parents fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report: 2 deaths and 4 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, the internet celebrity "Juanzi Loves to Eat", who has 410,000 followers, joked during a live broadcast that 918 was "618", saying that she didn't care about it. Subsequently, the internet celebrity's live broadcast room was blocked and her account was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lianhe Zaobao tells the details of the attack on a primary school student at a Japanese school in Shenzhen
At the time, he was accompanied by his mother to school. After the attack, he had large knife wounds on his abdomen and thighs, "his intestines were exposed."
The mother's hands were covered in blood and she collapsed and asked for help: "What did my child do wrong?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of September 19, Liu Wenjie, Party Secretary and Director of the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance, died unexpectedly. There were rumors that the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance was tied up and thrown off the building. The Paper reported that three people fell from the building and died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, in Dongguan, Guangdong, a toll collector took a photo of a black car on the roadside and issued a receipt. He then discovered that "Dongguan Law Enforcement" was sprayed on the door of the car. The toll collector was stunned for a moment, then quickly took the bill away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the report of "Japanese elementary school students attacked in Shenzhen" released by Caixin.com and Phoenix News has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen said on a social platform that he supported China's anti-Japanese wave, indiscriminate beating and attacking Japanese people, and killing some Japanese people as a sacrifice to the gods every year on September 18th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The scene where Liu Wenjie, director of the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance, fell from a building

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 18, Zhuzhou, Hunan. Primary school students were queuing to cross the road when a man drove his car through the street and was stopped. He got out of the car and shouted, "Do you want to die?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Citizens spontaneously went to the scene to lay flowers in memory of the Japanese students who were killed in the attack. The sign of Shenzhen Japanese School has been covered up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A small card next to the flowers read "I'm sorry, Shenzhen people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the Weibo topic #湖南省财务厅厅长刘文杰猝亡# has been banned by the platform

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen consulted several flower shops near the Shenzhen Japanese School, and one of the flower shops said: There are dozens of orders to be delivered to the Japanese School today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida expressed condolences to the children killed in the attack on the Japanese school in Shenzhen

content: September 18, Qingdao, Shandong. A man accused the traffic police of not parking properly when enforcing the law, and asked the traffic police to issue a ticket to the police car he was driving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 18, Taiyuan, Shanxi. An old lady wearing a red armband refused to allow disabled people around to set up stalls, and shouted: "This is my territory, I have the final say." The police arrived and "confronted" her with "wits and courage", and finally persuaded her to go back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19, Anhui. A netizen said that a green line appeared on the screen of his vivo mobile phone the day before yesterday, and several other customers in the store also encountered the same situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Be careful! The scene of the fall. In the picture, there are three people lying on the ground, and there is a large bloodstain next to them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 18, a netizen posted a video saying that a domestic train station required passengers to register their power bank information when entering the station. The passenger asked the staff to provide documents, but the staff could not produce the relevant documents and said that this was a verbal order from the leader. The passenger and the staff had an argument, and then a person who seemed to be of a higher level came and said that it was an internal requirement of the railway system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19 (Released) A netizen from Taiwan posted on Xiaohongshu that his friend entered Shanghai from Taiwan on August 27 and has been out of contact for more than 20 days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Panasonic Group issued a notice that it will allow employees stationed in China to temporarily return to Japan with their families, and the company will bear the expenses. "I would like to ask the government to take more measures than ever before to ensure the safety of Japanese residents," said Masanori Katayama, chairman of the Japan Automobile Manufacturers Association (JAMA) and chairman of Isuzu Motors, at a press conference on the 19th. "

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens posted pictures about the Japanese students being attacked and killed in Shenzhen, but their posts were blocked by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of netizens left messages in the comment section of the Japanese Embassy in China account to express their condolences and comfort to the boy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xifeng Liquor's subsidiary Guohuaci Xifeng Liquor invited Sima Nan to be a guest spokesperson, and many people named Xifeng Liquor "Jiatou Liquor". After this rare negative endorsement effect occurred, on September 19, Xifeng Liquor headquarters issued a document requiring that the "cultural celebrities" invited by subordinate companies must be consistent with the brand concept and corporate culture of Xifeng Liquor, and must report in writing. It is strictly forbidden to carry out market brand promotion activities in the name of Xifeng Liquor without permission, and serious accountability will be imposed once discovered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens joked that finding Sima Nan as a spokesperson would not stimulate consumption but would shrink it.
